sentences.en: On a plane, a priest sent for an airhostess.
sentences.cn: 飞机上, 神父叫来空中小姐.

sentences.en: The airhostess assured the passenger that nothing was wrong with the plane.
sentences.cn: 空中小姐使旅客确信飞机一切正常.

sentences.en: Then the airplane is airborne, the airhostess will start to feed you.
sentences.cn: 飞机升入空中后, 女服务员们开始送上吃的东西.
